question: Which one of the following statements is not correct?
option1: Rourkela Steel Plant, the first; integrated steel plant in the Public sector of India was set up with the Soviet Union collaboration.
option2: Salem Steel Plant is a premier producer of stainless steel in India.
option3: Maharashtra Eletrosmelt Ltd is a subsidiary of the Steel Authority of India Ltd.
option4: Visakhapatnam Steel Plant is a unit of the Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Ltd.
answer: Rourkela Steel Plant, the first; integrated steel plant in the Public sector of India was set up with the Soviet Union collaboration.
explanation: Rourkela Steel Plant is the first integrated steel plant in the public sector in India. It was set up with German collaboration with an installed capacity of 1 million tonnes.
